Uses of Class
xxl.core.io.fat.DirectoryEntryInformation

  • Packages that use DirectoryEntryInformation 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.io.fat
    This part is an implementation of the FAT12/16/32-filesystem based on raw access.

    • Uses of DirectoryEntryInformation in xxl.core.io.fat

      Fields in xxl.core.io.fat declared as DirectoryEntryInformation 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected DirectoryEntryInformation ListClusterChainEntriesIterator.dirEntInf
      The actual directory entry.
      protected DirectoryEntryInformation EntriesFilterIterator.dirEntInf
      The actual directory entry.
      Methods in xxl.core.io.fat that return DirectoryEntryInformation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected DirectoryEntryInformation DIR.findDirectoryEntry(long clusterNumber, String fileName, boolean isRoot)
      Find the directory entry with the given fileName in the cluster chain started at the given cluster number.
      DirectoryEntryInformation DIR.findDirectoryEntry(String directoryName)
      Return the directory entry information about directoryName or null in case the file doesn't exist.
      Methods in xxl.core.io.fat with parameters of type DirectoryEntryInformation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void DIR.writeDirectoryEntry(DirectoryEntryInformation dirEntInf)
      Write the directory entry of dirEntInf at the positions given by dirEntInf to disk.
